steps.name: I wait for home page to load
I enter mobile number as "1234567" and choose "Kotak" bank
I validate complete EMI transaction page is loaded and enter valid mobile number
I validate select EMI transaction page is loaded and choose tenure of emi as option 1
I validate transaction confirmation page is loaded and enter the card number as 1234
I validate confirm transaction section is loaded and enter valid otp as 777777 then click on confirm
